net.sf.jasperreports.engine.fill

Class JREvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.fill.JREvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetExpressionEvaluator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroovyEvaluator, JavaScriptCompiledEvaluator, JavaScriptEvaluator, JRBshEvaluator

    public abstract class JREvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatasetExpressionEvaluator
    Base class for the dynamically generated expression evaluator classes.
    Version:
    $Id: JREvaluator.java 6194 2013-05-29 16:04:27Z lucianc $
    Author:
    Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
